Translations.Text: a kitabamam marayamana kis'sa num pana varnana karo, jyare te potana gharavala'othi alaga tha'i, pascima tarapha avi
Ane te loko tarapha parado kari lidho, pachi ame teni pase ruha (jibra'ila a.Sa.) Ne mokalya, basa! Te temani same sampurna vyakti bani pragata thaya
te (marayama) kaheva lagi, hum tarathi rahamananum sarana mangum chum jo tum thodoka pana allahathi daravavalo hoya
tene javaba apyo ke hum to allaha'e mokalelo sandesavahaka chum, tane eka pavitra balaka apava avyo chum
kaheva lagi, mare tyam balaka kevi rite tha'i sake che? Mane to ko'i manusyano hatha pana nathi adyo ane na to hum duracari chum

tene (jibra'ile) kahyum, vata to avi ja che, parantu tara palanaharanum kahevum che ke te mara mate khuba ja sarala che, ame to ane loko mate eka nisani banavisum. Ane potani khasa krpa, a to eka nakki thayeli vata che
basa! Te garbhavati tha'i ga'i ane ana ja karane te durana sthale jati rahi
pachi pida tene eka khajurana vrksa nice la'i avi kahyum, kasa! Hum a pahela ja mrtyu pami hota ane lokoni yadathi pana bhula'i jati
etala manja tene nicethi pokaravamam avi ane kahyum ke nirasa na tha, tara palanahare tara paga nice eka jharanum vahavyum che
ane te khajurani daline potani tarapha halava, dali tara mate taji khajura padase
have santi thi kha ane pi ane ankho thandi rakha, jo tane ko'i vyakti male, to kahi de je ke mem dayalu allahana namano rojho rakhyo che, hum aje ko'i vyakti sathe vata nahim karum
have isa (a.Sa.)Ne la'i te potani koma samaksa avi, sau kaheva lagya, marayama tem ghanum adhama krtya karyum
he harunani bahena! Na to tara pita kharaba vyakti hatam ane na to tari mata duracari hati
Marayame potana balaka tarapha isaro karyo, sau kaheva lagya ke ju'o, ame a navajata balaka sathe vata kevi rite kari'e
balaka kaheva lagyum, ke hum allahano bando chum tene mane kitaba api ane mane potano payagambara banavyo
ane tene mane pavitra karyo che, jyam pana hum chum ane tene mane namajha ane jhakatano adesa apyo che jyam sudhi hum jivita rahum
ane tene mane potani matani seva karanara banavyo che ane mane vidrohi ane duracari nathi banavyo
ane mara para mara janma vakhate ane mara mrtyuna samaye ane te divase, ke jyare hum biji vara jivita karavamam avisa, salamati ja salamati che
a che satya kis'so marayamana putra isano, a ja che te satya vata jena vise loko sanka kare che
allaha ta'alane santana hovum asakya che, te to atyanta pavitra che, tene to jyare ko'i karya karavani iccha thaya che, to tene kahi de che ke tha'i ja, to te ja samaye te tha'i jaya che
maro ane tamara sauno palanahara phakta allaha che, tame sau teni ja bandagi karo, a ja satya marga che
pachi a jutho andaro'andara vivada karava lagya, basa! Inkara karanara'o mate “vaila” che, eka mota divasani hajari vakhate
ketala jonara ane sambhalanara hase, te divase jyare amari samaksa hajara thase, parantu aje to a atyacari loko spasta rite pathabhrasta che
tame temane a hatasa ane nirasana divasana bhayani jana api do, jyare karyano nirnaya kari devamam avase ane a loko bedarakari ane inkaramam ja rahi jase
ame pote ja dharati ane dharatini dareka vastuna varasadara ho'isum ane dareka loko amari tarapha ja pacha pheravavamam avase
